resources.string: Are you sure you want to leave?

Create your first digital identity\nEasily manage multi-chain wallets
Registered account will automatically add multi-chain wallet

To enabled access to the album， please enable access to file
Enter a valid eth address or ens domain(end in .eth)
Two password entries do not match
Removing identity and all imported wallets, please make sure all wallets are backed up
Please enter the name you want to replace
Warning: If you do not properly back up, you will not be able to retrieve your wallet after deleting. Please handle this operation carefully.
The wallet’s assets and amount will be hidden when privacy mode is turned on.
The wallet password can be modified while the mnemonic is being imported.
Copy and paste the contents of the PrivateKey file into the input box. Or enter the QR code generated by scanning the Private Key content.
Don\'t save to email, notepad, web, chat, etc., it\'s very dangerous
Please do not transmit with the internet
Please do not transmit with the internet, once acquired by a hacker, it will cause irreparable loss of assets. It is recommended to transmit with offline devices by scanning QR code.
It is recommended to manage with the password management tool
The QR code is forbidden to save, take screenshots or photos. It is only for users to scan directly in a secure environment to easily import the wallet
Please make sure there is no one or no camera around before use. Once the QR code is acquired by others, it will cause irreparable loss of assets.
Please enter the password hint you want to replace
Please enter the name of the wallet you want to replace
Password verification failed, please enter again
Asset security cannot be guaranteed without proper backup. After deleting the app or wallet, you need your back up files to restore wallet.
Please make a backup in a safe environment with no cameras around.
Please carefully record the mnemonic below and we will verify it in the next step.
Please click on the mnemonic in order to confirm that you are backing up correctly.
Import failed, has reached the maximum number of external wallets
There is a new version, please update now to enjoy full functionality
Click here to launch download apk website
You currently have the latest version
Must not be blank at the beginning and end
The mnemonic has an incorrect format
Can\'t get asset amount, Please add coin asset into wallet first
Please confirm the receipt address format
The receipt address must not be the same as the payment address
Please enter a valid cic address
Please enter a valid guc address
Please verify your identity to browse your wallet
Hope Seed supports a new wallet!
To add a wallet, please enter identity (wallet) password.

Selecting to use the identity QR CODE backup will back up all wallets (system wallet + external wallet) under the current identity. A unique QRCODE will be provided to restore all wallets when you restore your identity or import your wallet later.

When you choose to back up your identity mnemonics, the system will help you to export the wallet mnemonics under "Original Identity." Please note that this mnemonic does not include your externally imported wallet information. If you restore your identity with this mnemonic, you will not restore the externally imported wallet content.
Do you want to start QR CODE backup?
The passwords and hints you enter will enable secure encryption protection and booting for the QR Code. Please use a password that is easy to remember and an appropriate hint message.
Password and password hint can\'t be the same
Password and password hint can\'t be empty

After storing the QR CODE, you can use the QR CODE for identity recovery and wallet import. Be sure to remember the QR CODE password you set, and you will be required to enter it to verify your identity when you use it.
Your identity wallet could not be imported. Please try a different QR CODE
Please enter a QR CODE password to unlock
Existing wallet addresses will not be imported.
Do you want to restore the contents of this QR CODE? \nAll wallets will use your newly set payment password and hint after importing
QR CODE has changed. Save it？
Are you sure you want to delete the wallet?

When you choose to use the identity QR CODE to import the wallet, you can quickly import all the contents of the wallet contained in the QR CODE to the current identity. When importing, you will be asked to enter the QR CODE password you set when you backed up.

To choose to import using the wallet private key, you need to select the specific imported wallet type (BTC / ETH … ), and the system will import the content of the private key corresponding to the wallet type into the identity.
The server is busy, please try again later(z)
Please enter a description within 30 words
Remarks are too long, please re-enter
Using mnemonics to generate new wallet
Create new wallet success, need restart App
Tips: Need setting on the original phones
After setting password, you can transfer your IM account to another phone

This mobile barcode is designed for you by the INFIREUM wallet, so that you can easily and quickly restore all your wallet accounts on INFIREUM in the future. \ n \ nBack up your account information properly and do not upload to Drive or access it on any public network. This is crucial for your future actions such as maintaining asset security and restoring your account.
Please read the precautions before exporting
The QR code is forbidden to save, take screenshots or photos. It is only for users to scan directly in a secure environment to easily import the wallet
Please make sure there is no one or no camera around before use. Once the QR code is acquired by others, it will cause irreparable loss of assets
Don\'t save to email, notepad, web, chat, etc., it\'s very dangerous
Please do not transmit with the internet
Please do not transmit with the internet, once acquired by a hacker, it will cause irreparable loss of assets. It is recommended to transmit with offline devices by scanning QR code.
It is recommended to manage with the password management tool
Please enter a description within 20 character
Please enter the %s address or scan the barcode

Please enter BTC address or scan the qrcode

Your deposit request has already done.You can check the transaction status from record.
Your withdraw request has already done.You can check the transaction status from record.
As long as you deposit more than 10 USDTs in a single transaction, you will receive 1 TTN coin.
The minimum number of transactions per transaction is %1$s %2$s
Please select the currency you received

Here is the TTChain Lightning Payment Wallet, where you can experience the second-speed arrival transaction on the TTChain chain. \n\nIf you are using it for the first time, we only need a few seconds to do a simple tour guide for you.
Your lightning exchange request has been successful. You can check the status of this transaction by going to the flash transaction record.

Risks and Limitation of Liability
 Use of the Services and participation in Transactions may carry financial risk. 
 You acknowledge and agree that you are aware of such risks, including the following:
 
 1. Definition and significance of TTN
 TTN is the proof of the rights of TTChain trading platform itself. TTN is the base currency and trading gas fee for TTChain decentralized trading platform. TTN holders can enjoy various benefits and benefits of the platform. At the same time, TTN holders can also participate in TTN community governance.
 
 *For more instructions on the usage of TTN platform token and its application in TTChain public chain, please read the latest version of TTChain official website white paper.
 
 2. Trading Digital Tokens can be very risky. Digital Tokens are, by their nature, highly experimental, risky, volatile and Transactions are generally irreversible. All Transactions are final and there are no refunds. You acknowledge and agree that you will access and use the Services and participate in Transactions at your own risk. The risk of loss in trading Digital Tokens can be substantial. You should, therefore, carefully consider whether such trading is suitable for you in light of your circumstances and financial resources.
 
 3. Understanding Digital Tokens and Transactions may require advanced technical knowledge. Digital Tokens are often described in exceedingly technical language that requires a comprehensive understanding of applied cryptography and computer science in order to appreciate the inherent risks of trading Digital Tokens. Any reference to a type of Digital Token on the Services does not indicate our approval or disapproval of the underlying technology regarding such type of Token, and should not be used as a substitute for your own understanding of the risks specific to each type of Token. We make no warranty as to the suitability of the Digital Tokens referenced on the Services and assume no fiduciary duty in our relations with you.
 
 4. You accept the risk of trading Digital Tokens. TTChain does not advise on trading risk. In entering into any transactions, you represent that you have been, are and will be solely responsible for making your own independent appraisal and investigations into the risks of the Transaction and the underlying Digital Tokens. You represent that you have sufficient knowledge, market sophistication, professional advice and experience to make your own evaluation of the merits and risks of any Transaction or any underlying Token. You accept all consequences of participating in Transactions, including the risk that you may lose access to your Digital Tokens indefinitely. All Transaction decisions are made solely by you. Notwithstanding anything in these Terms of Service, we accept no responsibility whatsoever for and will in no circumstances be liable to you in connection with Transactions. Under no circumstances will the operation of all or any portion of the Services be deemed to create a relationship that includes the provision or tendering of investment advice.
 
 5. You are aware of and accept the risk of operational challenges. The Services may experience sophisticated cyber attacks, unexpected surges in activity or other operational or technical difficulties that may cause interruptions to or delays on the Services. You agree to accept the risk of a Transaction failure resulting from unanticipated or heightened technical difficulties, including those resulting from sophisticated attacks, and you agree not to hold us accountable for any related losses. We will not bear any liability, whatsoever, for any damage or interruptions caused by any viruses that may affect your computer or other equipment, or any phishing, spoofing or other attack. We advise the regular use of a reputable and readily available virus screening and prevention software.
 
 6. We do not own or control the underlying software protocols that govern the operation of Digital Tokens referenced on the Services. In general, the underlying protocols are open source and anyone can use, copy, modify, and distribute them. By accessing or using the Services, you acknowledge and agree that we are not responsible for operation of the underlying protocols and that we make no guarantee of their functionality, security, or availability; and that the underlying protocols are subject to sudden changes in operating rules, and that such forks may materially affect the value, function, and/or even the name of the Token referenced on the Services. In the event of a fork, you agree that we may temporarily suspend our operations (with or without advance notice to you) and that we may, in our sole discretion, decide whether or not to support (or cease supporting) either branch of the forked protocol entirely. You acknowledge and agree that we assume absolutely no responsibility whatsoever in respect of an unsupported branch of a forked protocol.
 
 7. Some of the Services may not work properly from time to time. We may not be held responsible regarding any damages you may have because of any failure of the Services.
 
 8. We make no representation that any materials or Services on TTChain are appropriate, lawful or available in any locations out of Republic of Angola. If you choose to access our services from other locations instead of Republic of Angola, we assume absolutely no responsibility whatsoever in respect of any breach of the local law of your jurisdiction.
Are you sure you want to delete your account?

After deleting the account, all the records in the TTChain App will be cleared. Please make sure that the backup information has been saved before executing.\n\nPlease note that if you delete an account without a backup account, you will never be able to retrieve assets such as your account and the included wallet.
Confirm that it will be restarted immediately after deletion
Please select the receiving currency first, the system will automatically detect
Please enter the amount of the payment
When a payment request is sent, the miner’s fee will be paid by the payer.
Payment can be transferred directly to you within the time limit.
Send a payment message to \< you />
The most popular community waiting for you to participate
The new knowledge of the currency circle is here
Install apk failure, you have to allow install apps permission from %s. Try again?
BTC, USDT-Omni cannot transfer money continuously!

What reason leads to failure when you want to transfer second time if BTC and USDT-Omni that have just been transferred have not yet arrived? The reason is because of the design logic of Bitcoin public chain, the first transfer will take up UTXO (unconsumed transaction output) until the transfer is successful. It is recommended that you wait for the first BTC, USDT-Omni transfer to be successful before operating the second one. Suggested solution: use TTChain public chain transfer BTC, USDT-Omni.
Please enter the private key or use the action barcode to scan
The TTChain team will not save your wallet password, nor will it assist you in recovering your wallet password. Please set a password and password prompt.
If you forget the password, you will lose the assets in your wallet. Please pay special attention.
Please enter the address or use the action bar code to scan the address
Please enter a comment within twenty characters

After dissolving the community, all records in the community will be deleted and members will leave.
Back up your account information and do not upload to Drive or access it on any public network. This is crucial for your future actions such as maintaining asset security and restoring your account.
This nickname refers to you in the chat system. Do not use indecent text
It is recommended to use a combination of English case and numbers
The content of the prompt should not be the same as the password to avoid being easily stolen
I agree with the TTChain Privacy Policy
The wallet name will be changed to the new name
You are about to delete this wallet
The wallet cannot be recovered after it is deleted. Please make sure that all assets in the wallet have been transferred.
Please name the new Bitcoin wallet
Please name the newly created Ethereum wallet
The TTChain team will not save your wallet password, nor will it be able to assist in recovering it if you lose your wallet password. Please set up password and password reminders carefully.
If you forget your password, you will lose the assets in your wallet, please pay special attention.
This mobile barcode backup contains: all INFIREUM Wallet-created wallets and lightning wallets, chat identity and chat history.

This mobile barcode is designed by INFIREUM for you, so that you can easily and quickly restore all wallets on your account in the future.\n\n Make a backup copy of your account information and do not upload to Drive or access it on any public network. This is important for your future actions such as maintaining asset security and restoring your account.
Enter mnemonics, a total of 12 characters
Are you sure you want to skip it?

Backing up your account action code is very important for your future actions such as maintaining asset security and restoring your account. \n\nIf you lose your phone without a backup account, or if you lose your account due to various accidents, it will never be recovered.
